pr_title: [plugin-mobile-app] Fix possible unsupported operation exception on immutable list

timeline.message: [plugin-mobile-app] Fix possible unsupported operation exception on immutable list

timeline.bodyText: which part of search actions produces immutable list?
timeline.author: valfirst

replies.bodyText: https://github.com/vividus-framework/vividus/blob/master/vividus-extension-selenium/src/main/java/org/vividus/ui/action/search/AbstractElementAction.java there are two places with List.of()
replies.author: uarlouski
